certificateDescription: Successfully passed the CBBF Certification exam, demonstrating proficiency in blockchain technologies and decentralized applications.
Awarded the Test Passing Certificate from PIAIC, reflecting a strong understanding of emerging technologies and their applications.
Honored with the Best Employee Certificate at InvoZone for outstanding performance and dedication to excellence.

Completed the Foundations of Project Management course on Coursera, gaining essential skills in project planning, execution, and management. [Verify](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/verify/QWJK8ZNLHFMD)
